My motto, *Per Mare Ad Prosperitatem*, echoes in my mind – it's through the sea I've always found my way, and it's to the sea I must look again to build something lasting. Being adaptable has always been my strength, and I'll need it to navigate the currents of Venetian commerce and achieve the independence I crave, turning these ducats into a real enterprise and a name for myself.
